name: Mars International (India)
description: Supplier of a wide range of portable acc
overview:
Established in the year 2007, we, “Mars International (India)”, are an eminent Manufacturer, Distributor and Supplier of a qualitative assortment of Mobile Phone Accessories such as Travel charger, Batteries and Back Covers. Our offered products are Car Charger, Bluetooth Hands free, Universal Charger, Screen Guard and Flip Pouch etc.

Our Products: Car Mobile Charger Universal Mobile Charger Mobile Hands Free Mobile Battery

Client Satisfaction: Our clients are the base of our business and their satisfaction is the basic mantra for our success in the industry. Our presence in the industry for these many years has made it possible for us to understand the requirements of clients.

Our Infrastructure: We are backed by a state-of-the-art infrastructure that is equipped with latest machines and technology. For the smooth operation of business we have grouped the unit with several in-housed departments such as manufacturing, warehousing & packaging and quality control unit etc.

Our Team: We are backed by exceptionally talented and experienced team of professionals, who enable us in achieving our organizational goal in an efficient manner. Our talented team of professionals works in close co-ordination with clients in order to fulfill their wide demands.
